title: New: Work Drugs – License To Drive
content:
Work Drugs have this hugely enviable ability to be able to write insanely catchy pop tracks, and boy do they show it on License To Drive, their first new material of 2012.

As they put it so sweetly, this is music to ‘sext’ to; I can just picture driving through a picturesque, slightly run-down American suburb in a beat-up faux-Cadillac, with some cute girls in the back of the car, roof down, hair flying, License To Drive blasting through the speakers. Thank you Work Drugs for allowing me to dream.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
